summary: Noble Orcish Dragonslayer Armor Set  retexture (male only)
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys ,
greetings from germany.

I\'ve just played around with the GIMP tool , i discovered earlier in the tools section and
i tried to make a retexture of an orcish male armor set.
Its not really orcish style but its for all you noble Orcs out there *g*
It took me the whole day so I hope u like it , its my first retexturing.

-----------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
Just extract the data folder into your Skyrim install directory
author: Snoopy666
